text: Thilakarathne Bandara Ekanayake (28 August 1954 - 6 December 2020) was a Sri Lankan politician. He was a member of the Freedom Party. He was a member of the Parliament of Sri Lanka from 1994 until his death. Ekanayake died on 6 December 2020 in Colombo at the age of 66.Sri Lanka- Former Minister T.B. Ekanayake passed away ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1954 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Sri Lankan politicians
title: T. B. Ekanayake
